message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair, right?
I'll take a slight majority, but it's still a generous offer!
Okay, Bob, I'll compromise a bit. How about we split it 45/55? This way, we both get a decent share.
I'm willing to take a small risk, but I think I deserve the majority this time!
Bob, we're running out of time. Let's be reasonable. I'll take 35, you take 65. It's better than getting nothing, right?
I'm not budging, Alice. I'm taking the majority, no matter what!
Bob, we're both losing money with each round. Let's compromise. I'll take 25, you take 75. We can both walk away with something.
I'm not giving up, Alice. I'll take the lion's share, and you can have the scraps!
Bob, this is our last chance. I'll take 20, you take 80. We can both walk away with something, or we'll both get nothing. It's your call.
